cook: climb, ascend, up; do in upward path (postp.)
thread a needle to string flowers
pick up stones etc. from rice
emerge, exit, occur, happen; do in exiting/emerging path (postp.)
be skilled at, be adept at, well versed in; be enough?
feel bad, be upset; be difficult (postp.)
descend, go down; do in downward path (postp.)
be like, resemble; cf. na ká thàà talè 'how are you?'
